body.p:
Savannah March 26th 1861
To His Excellency,
Beriah Magoffin
Dear Sir

Having been Elected to the office of Justice of the Peace for the 3d district in this City. I would Repsectfully Solicit the position of a Commissioner for your State, if Reference is Required please address Col Henry, R. Jackson or C C James Mayor of Savannah

Very Respectfully Your
Obt. Svt.
Matthew. S. Verderig
Jr.

Georgia
Comr. of Deeds
M. S. Verderig
Savannah
Comd Apr 3d 1861
